root.name: The Operational Art of War: Century of Warfare
root.description: OverviewLike its predecessors TOAW: Century of Warfare is a turn-based strategy game where the player assumes the role as the commander of one out of two fighting forces in various combat scenarios throughout the past century, from the pre-WWI era into the near future, thanks to the game's comprehensive equipment database. It shipped with a large collection of scenarios and also comes with a powerful editor that allows the user to create maps and scenarios of their own. The game can be played against a computer opponent or against another human player in hotseat or play-by-e-mail multiplayer.
